Module com.arcane.arithmetic
Package com.arcane.arithmetic

Class TutorialController

java.lang.Object
com.arcane.arithmetic.TutorialController
public class TutorialController extends Object
This is the Tutorial Controller, used for controls and events for the first tutorial scene.
Author:
Candice Williams
